entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
